Text: Hey @otnemem mate.Congrats for this game release.Good job dude.Now i have a request.Can u upload more games with LA Lakers and Miami Heat.!?My humble opinion is that those 2 teams,especially Heat makes awesome show and great scores and stuff and it totaly worth your effort..It would be great if we have more games of those two.??

I have no doubt they put on a show, but as I only watch Celtics' games and rarely watch other teams that's not something I can do with the lack of free time I have.

But check my other torrents for tips on how to find those games ;)
